title: Azuki Partners with Gorō Taniguchi for Anime Anthology
description: Yesterday, Chiru Labs, the creators of NFT collections Azuki and Beanz, announced a partnership with acclaimed anime director Gorō Taniguchi to create an anime anthology series. The move will be done to expand Chiru Labs’ IP and bring more people into the Azuki universe. Taniguchi, known for his work on Code Geass, One Piece Film:
